channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ノースイースタン大学のメレディス・クラークとThe Pivot Fundの創設者トレイシー・パウエルとのQ&A：BIPOC報道機関への資金提供の研究、ローカルニュースなどについて（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with Northeastern University's Meredith Clark and The Pivot Fund founder Tracie Powell about studying funding to BIPOC news outlets, local news, and more  —  “You say you're giving more dollars to BIPOC newsrooms?  Well, you're actually giving to intermediaries who are filtering down those dollars to BIPOC newsrooms.

item.title: Spotify、最大32人で1つのプレイリストをキュレーションできる新機能「Jam」を発表。Jamを作成できるのはPremium加入者のみだが、全ユーザーが投稿可能（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Spotify launches Jam, a new feature that lets up to 32 people curate a single playlist; only Premium subscribers can create Jams, but all users can contribute  —  Spotify is today introducing its latest social feature, Jam, which allows multiple people to blend their own musical tastes into a combined playlist.

item.title: カナダにおけるMetaのFacebookとInstagramのニュースブラックアウトが、同国の学生向け出版物や非営利コミュニティ・アウトレットにいかに大きな影響を与えているか（Mack DeGeurin/Gizmodo）
item.description:
Mack DeGeurin / Gizmodo:
How Meta's Facebook and Instagram news blackout in Canada is having an outsized effect on student publications and nonprofit community outlets in the country  —  Student publications and nonprofit community outlets are caught up in a drawn-out battle between the Canadian government, big-name publishers, and Meta.

item.title: MetaやBloombergなどが生成AIシステムのトレーニングに使用したBooks3データセットに含まれる著者を検索するツールをThe Atlanticが公開（Alex Reisner/The Atlantic）
item.description:
Alex Reisner / The Atlantic:
The Atlantic debuts a tool to look up authors whose work is in the Books3 dataset, which Meta, Bloomberg, and others used to train their generative AI systems  —  Use our new search tool to see which authors have been used to train the machines. … This summer, I acquired a data set …

item.title: SAG-AFTRA組合員、交渉不成立の場合、大手ゲーム会社10社に対するストライキを承認することを投票、投票率27.47％の後、98.32％が賛成票を投じる（David Robb/Deadline）
item.description:
David Robb / Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA members vote to authorize a strike against 10 of the major video game companies if negotiations fail; 98.32% voted in favor after a 27.47% turnout  —  - Lisa Takeuchi Cullen Elected President Of WGA East; Running Unopposed, She Succeeds Michael Winship

item.title: メールYouTubeは、2021年8月から一部の欧州諸国で試験的に提供している広告なしの月額6.99ユーロのPremium Lite層の提供を、2023年10月25日をもって終了する予定だ（Antonio G. Di Benedetto/The Verge）。
item.description:
Antonio G. Di Benedetto / The Verge:
Email: YouTube plans to stop offering its ad-free €6.99/month Premium Lite tier, piloted in select European countries since August 2021, after October 25, 2023  —  After YouTube spent two years piloting Premium Lite, a lower-cost subscription plan for ad-free video viewing in select countries …

item.title: 不動産に特化したウェブサイト、ニュースレター、ポッドキャスト、ビデオでデビューしたEstate Mediaが、Morning BrewのCEO Austin Rief氏らから165万ドルを調達（Megan Graham/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Megan Graham / Wall Street Journal:
Estate Media, a real estate-focused outlet debuting with a website, newsletters, podcasts, and video, raised $1.65M from Morning Brew CEO Austin Rief and others  —  Estate Media, which was co-founded by Josh Flagg, aims to give advertisers a new way of reaching both industry professionals and home buyers and sellers

item.title: 香港の裁判所は、香港で最後の権利擁護団体のひとつである大手ジャーナリスト団体の代表に、警察を妨害したとして5日間の実刑判決を下した（Jessie Pang/Reuters）
item.description:
Jessie Pang / Reuters:
A Hong Kong court sentences the head of a leading journalist group, one of the city's last groups advocating for rights, to five days for obstructing the police  —  The head of Hong Kong's leading journalists group was sentenced on Monday to five days jail for obstructing police officers …

item.title: Meduzaは、2023年の初めにペガサスを使ってドイツにいる創業者ガリーナ・ティムチェンコのiPhoneをハッキングしたのは、ロシアではなくEU諸国であることを示す新たな証拠があると述べている（Stephanie Kirchgaessner/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Stephanie Kirchgaessner / The Guardian:
Meduza says that new evidence points to an EU country, not Russia, hacking its founder Galina Timchenko's iPhone in Germany using Pegasus earlier in 2023  —  Galina Timchenko, the CEO of Meduza, was hacked earlier this year before participating in a meeting of exiled Russian journalists

item.title: Reddit、サイト上での「適格な貢献」によって獲得したカルマと受け取ったゴールドに基づき、認証済みユーザーに毎月支払うコントリビューター・プログラムを開始（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Reddit launches a Contributor Program that pays verified users monthly based on the karma earned and the gold received for “eligible contributions” on the site  —  Reddit is going to let users spin Reddit gold into real money as part of its new “Contributor Program,” the company announced on Monday.

item.title: スナップ、2023年5月にMy AIでスポンサーリンクをテストする計画を発表後、マイクロソフトと提携し、米国やその他の市場でMy AIチャットボットで広告を配信（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Snap partners with Microsoft to serve ads in its My AI chatbot in the US and other markets, after announcing in May 2023 plans to test Sponsored Links in My AI  —  Snapchat has a new advertising partner in Microsoft for the ads it's inserting into its AI product, My AI …

item.title: ドナルド・トランプは、2024年に当選した場合、NBCとMSNBCによる「一方的で悪質な報道」により、コムキャストを「国を脅かす反逆罪」で調査すると公約（Rachel Scully/The Hill）
item.description:
Rachel Scully / The Hill:
Donald Trump pledges to investigate Comcast for “Country Threatening Treason” due to “one-side and vicious coverage” by NBC and MSNBC, if he is elected in 2024  —  Former President Trump pledged to investigate Comcast, the parent company for NBC and MSNBC …

item.title: ゲッティはNvidiaと提携し、Generative AI by Getty Imagesを発表した。Generative AI by Getty Imagesは、ゲッティのライセンス写真で学習させたツールで、ユーザーは法的に保護された画像を作成できる（Emilia David/The Verge）
item.description:
Emilia David / The Verge:
Getty partners with Nvidia to launch Generative AI by Getty Images, a tool trained on Getty's licensed photos that lets users create legally protected images  —  Getty Images is partnering with Nvidia to launch Generative AI by Getty Images, a new tool that lets people create images using Getty's library of licensed photos.

item.title: スポティファイがOpenAIと提携し、ポッドキャスターの声を合成して他言語のポッドキャストを再生するAI翻訳機能を発表（Amrita Khalid/The Verge）
item.description:
Amrita Khalid / The Verge:
Spotify partners with OpenAI to debut an AI translation feature that reproduces podcasts in other languages using a synthesized version of the podcaster's voice  —  What if podcasters could flip a switch and instantly speak another language?  That's the premise behind Spotify's …

item.title: 英国司法長官がラッセル・ブランドの記事について法廷侮辱の警告を発し、現在ブランドに対する捜査は行われていないとしてジャーナリストを驚かせた（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
UK's Attorney General issues a contempt of court warning about Russell Brand stories, surprising journalists as there is currently no investigation into Brand  —  Russell Brand has not been arrested, nor is any criminal investigation currently taking place.
